alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Hale; Perry; Shelby; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 12:38PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Chilton, southeastern Tuscaloosa, southwestern Shelby, northern Perry, east central Hale and Bibb Counties through 130 PM CST... At 1237 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Abernant to 7 miles northeast of Greensboro. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Pelham, Helena, Calera, Montevallo, Brent, Marion, Centreville, Jemison, Greensboro, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Maplesville, Wilton, Parnell, American Village, Maylene, Brierfield Ironworks Park and Low Gap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for central, south central and west central Alabama.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Chilton; Hale; Perry; Shelby; Tuscaloosa
